cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an out-of-range value 10 will cause MIMO configuration errors and degrade performance or fail initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為超出範圍的值 10 會導致 MIMO 配置錯誤，並降低效能或初始化失敗。
